form.name: form1

div.span: All schools in the Litchfield School District will continue to be closed for the next five weeks until May 3rd. Remote Learning will continue.

img.style: border-width:0px;width: 41px; vertical-align: middle; padding: 10px; border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);

br.span: Please click on the attached flyer for more information about the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and help stop the spread of rumors.

div.a: Annual Town and School District Voting

span.div: The Second Session of the annual meeting of the Town of Litchfield and Litchfield School District will be held at Campbell High School on Tuesday, March 10, 2020, from 7:00 am to 7:00 pm for the choice of Town and School District Officers elected by official ballot, to vote on questions required by law to be inserted on the official ballot, and to vote on all Warrant Articles from the first session on official ballot per RSA 40:13, VII.
A Voter Guide and Sample Ballot are attached for your convenience.
The Litchfield School District has adopted the ALICe response protocol for emergencies in our schools. For more information, please click on the link provided.
For further information or questions, please contact the SAU Office at 603-578-3570 x3330.

div.a: School Board Public Statement: Staff Tuition

br.span: Student Handbooks for GMS, LMS and CHS are now being published online.
Comcast has a new program to provide low-cost broadband internet access to eligible families in the National School Lunch Program.

a.title: The Litchfield School Board is scheduled to meet on Wednesday, May 6, 2020 at 6:00 pm at Litchfield Town Hall.  The public is welcome to attend.
Location: CHS Learning Commons Starting at: 6:30 PM
Location: CHS Learning Commons Starting at: 7:00 AM Ending at: 7:30 AM
The Litchfield School Board is scheduled to meet on Wednesday, May 20, 2020 at 6:00 pm at Litchfield Town Hall.  The public is welcome to attend.
The Litchfield School Board is scheduled to meet on Wednesday, June 3, 2020 at 6:00 pm at Litchfield Town Hall.  The public is welcome to attend.
Location: CHS Learning Commons Starting at: 6:30 PM

br.span: Please click on the attached flyer for more information about the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and help stop the spread of rumors.
